author: amaltaro
body:
This pull request converts our WMCore central services from Python2 to a Python3 stack. Besides the removal of the `pystack` package in:
https://github.com/dmwm/deployment/pull/1056

it does not require any deployment changes.

I managed to build it, upload to cmsrep, deploy and run services (even though the services themselves are failing due to bugs in the python3 code). Note that in order to be able to get the status and/or run these services, this WMCore patch is required:
https://github.com/dmwm/WMCore/pull/10573
title: Build WMCore CMSWEB services in Python3
